response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its worth to be around $10,000. Considering its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to its market value. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 9500}
